sentence:

Mr. ALFORD. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize our May Veteran of  the Month, Mr. Rick Fullerton of Independence, Missouri. He is a World  War II vet and lives at the Missouri Veterans Home in Warrensburg in  our district.
